page.title: 04PAST AND PRESENT 2.
page.content: The postman used to walk the 4 miles from Cheselbourne to collect and deliver mail.It would arrive from Dorchester on horseback.The doctor did his rounds on a pushbike.Everything seemed cleaner and tidier then than it does today. The old people actually thought that we didn't have assemblies or do sums or spellings in school today.They all agreed that school was far more strict then and probably less fun. The games they played were very simple,like marbles,skipping,conkers and hoops.They spent their \p pocket money on sweets. In spite of all the hardships they still said that they preferred 'the good old days'.Life seems far too hectic for them in today's world even in a country village.
